channel.title: Need help with server
channel.description:
i started a server, but i have some questions: 1. some npc are talking, the text appears on their heads. how can i lose this? 2. how can i change max lvls to 99 and cb 126? 3. where can i change so that i need smithing 99 to make rune plates. right now i just need 5 runite bars and i can make that.
ty.

item.title: Need help with server
item.dc:creator: @new1 new1
item.description:
@new1 wrote:

thanks.
hope someone could help me with smithing (but maybe it’s because i’m a owner, have to test it).

this server isn’t at the list.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok to stop npc from talking open npchandler and search for “moo” and under u shud see something like } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "happy ney years!"; }urs will not look the same, because thats santa saying happy new years!..but delete that if u see something like that

ok go in client.java and search for max xp u shud see if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || playerXP[skill] > ########) { sendMessage("Max XP value reached"); …change the #'s to: 14000000 there, ur max lvl is 99

for the smithing…i dont know

Read full topic
